title: Brigitte Nielson, 56, lovingly wraps her arm around husband Mattia Dessi, 41, on stroll
text:
They are devoted parents to their baby daughter Frieda, 16 months.

But Brigitte Nielson and Mattia Dessi took time away from parenting duties to enjoy a low-key stroll in Los Angeles on Wednesday.

The model, 56, lovingly wrapped her arm around the former bartender, 41, as he gazed down at his phone.

Smitten: Brigitte Nielson and Mattia Dessi took time away from parenting duties to enjoy a low-key stroll in Los Angeles on Wednesday

With her platinum blonde hair perfectly quiffed, Brigitte looked effortlessly chic in a white form fitting vest top, which she layered underneath a tailored cream blazer.

Strutting around in bow court shoes, the Danish model complemented the look with grey skinny jeans, a Gucci monogram bag, pink sunglasses.

Mattia, meanwhile, was casually-clad in a black slogan T-shirt, white chinos and trainers.

Stylish: With her platinum blonde hair perfectly quiffed, Brigitte looked effortlessly chic in a white form fitting vest top, which she layered underneath a tailored cream blazer

Brigitte welcomed baby Frida last June after a decade-long battle with IVF, and has spoke candidly about the relief she felt from falling pregnant at last.

Speaking to the Guardian recently, the model explained having Mattia completely on-board with her journey meant she was able to endure all she had to go through.

She said: 'You're on a lot of medication. It is very expensive. Hormones will do different things to different women.

Smitten: The model, 56, lovingly wrapped her arm around the former bartender, 41, as he gazed down at his phone

'You always think you are going to get pregnant, but most of the time, the phone call comes and it's "I'm sorry". It's devastating.'

Brigitte was advised by her doctor not to tell anyone when she did fall pregnant, until she was 27 weeks along, so she didn't even tell her own mother.

She admits to having to fight against some of the criticism she has faced after becoming a mother later in life.

She said: 'Some find it ridiculous, some find it awful and some love it. I don't think it's anyone's business. It's my husband and my life and we love what we do.'
description: The model, 56, lovingly wrapped her arm around the former bartender, 41, as they strolled through Los Angeles on Wednesday.
